General.Name: Yuexiu Transport Infrastructure Limited
General.Description: Yuexiu Transport Infrastructure Limited, together with its subsidiaries, invests in, develops, operates, and manages expressways and bridges in the People's Republic of China. It holds investments in operating expressways and bridge projects comprising Guangzhou Northern Second Ring Expressway, Guangzhou Western Second Ring Expressway, Guangzhou Northern Ring Road, Guangdong Humen Bridge, Shantou Bay Bridge, and Guangdong Qinglian Expressway located in the Guangdong Province; Han-Xiao Expressway, Suiyuenan Expressway, Hancai Expressway, Han'e Expressway, and Daguangnan Expressway in Hubei Province; Cangyu Expressway in Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region; Jinxiong Expressway in Tianjin Municipality; Changzhu Expressway in Hunan Province; and Weixiu Expressway and Lanwei Expressway in Henan Province with an attributable toll length of approximately 477.7 kilometers. The company was formerly known as GZI Transport Limited and changed its name to Yuexiu Transport Infrastructure Limited in May 2011. Yuexiu Transport Infrastructure Limited was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.
General.Address: 17A, Yue Xiu Building, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
